price: Tunay na ito ay ang [bagay na] dati kayo hinggil dito ay nagtataltalan.”
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā mā kuntum bihi tamtarūna
